name: Nordic Music
description: Music from the Nordic countries, including Iceland, Norway, Sweden, Denmark, and Finland.

children.name: Dansbandsmusik
children.description: Nordic Pop style originating from 1960s Pop Rock, incorporating Swing, Schlager, Nordic Old Time Dance Music and Country influences.

children.name: Dansktop
children.description: Danish equivalent to Dansbandsmusik with Schlager and Country influences and Contemporary Folk and Pop elements.

children.name: Greenlandic Music
children.description: Majorly from Inuit ethnic groups in Greenland, a large island between the Atlantic and Arctic Oceans.

children.name: Nordic Folk Music
children.description: Folk of Nordic countries of Denmark, Finland, Iceland, Norway, and Sweden.

children.name: Nordic Folk Rock
children.description: Fusion of Nordic Folk Music and Rock.

children.name: Rautalanka
children.description: Nordic guitar style mainly influenced by Rock & Roll, and traditional European Schlager.

children.name: Visa
children.description: Nordic balladry focusing on lyrical content and simple vocal melodies.
